title: Fonts for the humanities
content:
I have issued a new and brief overview about some of my rather [scientific font works](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230306/http:/stoetzner-gestaltung.prosite.com/239981/2938463/arbeiten-projects/typefaces-v-scientific-fonts) of the last few years; you’re welcome to have a look at some other stuff on my [Behance/Prosite](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230306/http:/stoetzner-gestaltung.prosite.com/239981/arbeiten-projects) as well.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LMU_Runen_typeforum_4279.png)
author: Andreas Stötzner
